meanings.definition: A person who engages in an activity for pay, but not as a full-time occupation.
meanings.sent1: The semipros played basketball on weekends for extra money.
meanings.sent2: She worked as a semipros in the evenings while studying during the day.
meanings.sent3: The semipros juggler entertained the crowd with his part-time skills.
meanings.sent4: Being a semipros chef, he cooked up delicious meals in his spare time.
meanings.sent5: The semipros musician strummed his guitar at local events for fun and profit.
